Keep track of whether any of the passes modifies the module, and if so, return true.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### RefreshCallGraph() {#a232124c5d47b0600826c871de8854619}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CGPassManager::RefreshCallGraph (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraphscc">CallGraphSCC</a> &amp; CurSCC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a> &amp; CG, bool CheckingMode)</>}>
Scan the functions in the specified CFG and resync the callgraph with the call sites found in it.

This is used after FunctionPasses have potentially munged the callgraph, and can be used after <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraphscc">CallGraphSCC</a> passes to verify that they correctly updated the callgraph.

This function returns true if it devirtualized an existing function call, meaning it turned an indirect call into a direct call. This happens when a function pass like GVN optimizes away stuff feeding the indirect call. This never happens in checking mode.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/callgraphsccpass-cpp/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/callgraphsccpass-cpp">CallGraphSCCPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RunAllPassesOnSCC() {#a9c20f5c586261232135305bc59c47a38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CGPassManager::RunAllPassesOnSCC (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraphscc">CallGraphSCC</a> &amp; CurSCC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a> &amp; CG, bool &amp; DevirtualizedCall)</>}>
Execute the body of the entire pass manager on the specified SCC.

This keeps track of whether a function pass devirtualizes any calls and returns it in DevirtualizedCall.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/callgraphsccpass-cpp/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/callgraphsccpass-cpp">CallGraphSCCPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
